summary: A plumber parked his van in front of an apartment house and went to the twelfth floor. He suspected one of his neighbors of being dishonest due to recent events. Ms. Franklin had a pearl necklace that went missing from her jewelry case. Fred Carson had a coin collection that disappeared from his bookshelf. The plumber, an addicted detective, felt uncomfortable suspecting his neighbor.
quotes: many particular things had happened recently there
one day he noticed that it was no longer there
